#summary Using CSS-X-Fire with Firebug Lite

= Prerequisites =

  * [http://getfirebug.com/firebuglite Firebug Lite] fully working with Google Chrome or Firefox

= Details =

  # Access the builtin help from CSS-X-Fire by pressing the "Help" icon in the IDE toolwindow.

  # Follow the link for "Google Chrome or Firefox with Firebug Lite"

  # Drag the *CSS-X-Fire* bookmarklet to the bookmarks toolbar.
